meanings.definition: Pretentious or hypocritical devotion to religious or moral principles.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sanctimonious.
meanings.sent1: The sanctimoniousness of his actions was evident to all.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the sanctimoniousness of the preacher's sermons.
